summary: Completed comprehensive testing of XplicitkreationZ e-commerce MVP. Backend APIs fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend age gate, product catalog, cart functionality, and checkout working correctly. Minor UI overlay issue found with Shop Now button.

ui_bugs.issue: Button not clickable due to overlay element intercepting pointer events
ui_bugs.details: Overlay div with class 'absolute inset-0 opacity-20' is blocking click events on Shop Now button

passed_tests: Navigation back to home via logo
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Shop Now button overlay issue - remove or adjust z-index of overlay div that's blocking click events on the hero section Shop Now button
